ygData.subject: RE: Yet another "Where Should I Hunt?" question....
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to lake rathe .. which is just south of SK (zone line right S of aviak village). Hunt the aviaks there.
ygData.messageBody:
Go to lake rathe .. which is just south of SK (zone line right S of aviak
village).

Hunt the aviaks there.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Vincent Archer [mailto:archer@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, January 11, 2000 10:13 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Yet another "Where Should I Hunt?"
> question....
>
>
> From: Vincent Archer <archer@...>
>
> According to PHAEDRA WHITLOCK:
> > South Karana. Hunt aviaks, centaurs and elephants until you
> can get into outside Paw Groups. Ive levelled from 22 to
> nearly 28 (last night) in about 3 weeks at Paw. The loot is
> good (FS weapons, whips sell for 30-50, gloves for 300-500,
> other Paw armor 10-15) and the money isnt bad, plat, gold and silver.
>
> If uncamped, yes, a good opportunity.
>
> Otherwise, Highhold Pass is good for about 2 more levels
> (once you hit 22,
> you get pitiful experience), at either Gnoll side (solo or
> small group)
> or Orc side (join one of the big groups that camp there)
>
> Picklaws at 20 is borderline, even the early groups, you'll get loads
> of resists, as they're all red.
>
> --
> Vincent Archer Email: archer@...
>
> All men are mortal. Socrates was mortal. Therefore, all men
> are Socrates.
> (Woody Allen)
